fw.name: PPRInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: PPRActivity
class.abstract: The interface is used to retrieve the items and resources of the current Activity.

method.name: PPRItems
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of items as Products aggregated by the Activity.

method.name: PPRItemsAndFTA
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of items as CATIAItems aggregated by the Activity.

method.name: PPRResources
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of resources as Products aggregated by the Activity.

class.name: PPRDocument
class.abstract: This interface is used to access Processes, Products and Resources.

method.name: Processes
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of Processes as Activities contained in the current document.

method.name: Products
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of Products contained in the current document.

method.name: Resources
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of Resources contained in the current document.

class.name: PPRProducts
class.abstract: This interface is used to retrieve and add Products from and to the list of Products.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds the specified Product to the current list of Products.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Retrieves the Product corresponding to the specified index in the list of Products.
